001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.assertion.CustomSoftAssertion;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentService;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
006import lombok.experimental.Delegate;
007
008/**
009 * Provides an enhanced test execution context by delegating core operations to an underlying {@code Quest} instance.
010 *
011 * <p>The {@code SuperQuest} class wraps a {@code Quest} instance, delegating methods such as registering or removing
012 * test services, retrieving artifacts, accessing storage, and managing soft assertions. This ensures that all
013 * functionality available in {@code Quest} is seamlessly accessible, while also enabling extended behaviors in the
014 * test execution flow.
015 *
016 * <p>Methods in this class mirror those in {@code Quest} and provide consistent documentation for interacting with
017 * the test execution context.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021public final class SuperQuest extends Quest {
022
023   /**
024    * The underlying {@code Quest} instance that holds the original test execution context.
025    */
026   @Delegate
027   private final Quest original;
028
029
030   /**
031    * Constructs a new {@code SuperQuest} by wrapping the provided {@code Quest}.
032    *
033    * @param quest the original {@code Quest} instance to be wrapped.
034    */
035   public SuperQuest(Quest quest) {
036      this.original = quest;
037   }
038
039
040   /**
041    * Retrieves an artifact from the underlying quest.
042    *
043    * <p>This method delegates the call to the underlying {@code Quest} instance,
044    * extracting an instance of the specified artifact type from the corresponding test service.
045    *
046    * @param ringType    the class type of the test service.
047    * @param artifactType the class type of the artifact to retrieve.
048    * @param <T>          the type of the test service.
049    * @param <K>          the type of the artifact.
050    * @return the artifact instance retrieved from the underlying quest.
051    */
052   @Override
053   public <T extends FluentService, K> K artifact(Class<T> ringType, Class<K> artifactType) {
054      return original.artifact(ringType, artifactType);
055   }
056
057
058   /**
059    * Registers a test service (ring) into the underlying quest.
060    *
061    * <p>This method delegates the registration of the test service to the underlying {@code Quest} instance,
062    * ensuring that the test execution context is aware of the new service.
063    *
064    * @param ringType the class type of the test service.
065    * @param ring     the instance of the test service.
066    */
067   @Override
068   public void registerRing(Class<? extends FluentService> ringType, FluentService ring) {
069      original.registerRing(ringType, ring);
070   }
071
072
073   /**
074    * Retrieves a registered test service from the underlying quest without modifying the context.
075    *
076    * <p>This method delegates the retrieval to the underlying {@code Quest} instance,
077    * returning the requested test service instance.
078    *
079    * @param ringType the class type of the test service to retrieve.
080    * @param <T>       the type of the test service.
081    * @return the corresponding test service instance.
082    */
083   @Override
084   public <T extends FluentService> T cast(Class<T> ringType) {
085      return super.cast(ringType);
086   }
087
088
089   /**
090    * Removes a test service from the underlying quest.
091    *
092    * <p>This method delegates the removal operation to the underlying {@code Quest} instance,
093    * ensuring that the specified test service is no longer part of the execution context.
094    *
095    * @param ringType the class type of the test service to remove.
096    */
097   @Override
098   public void removeRing(Class<? extends FluentService> ringType) {
099      original.removeRing(ringType);
100   }
101
102
103   /**
104    * Provides access to the storage instance from the underlying quest.
105    *
106    * <p>The storage instance is used for managing temporary test data during execution.
107    *
108    * @return the {@link Storage} instance for the underlying quest.
109    */
110   @Override
111   public Storage getStorage() {
112      return original.getStorage();
113   }
114
115
116   /**
117    * Provides access to the soft assertion handler from the underlying quest.
118    *
119    * <p>The soft assertion handler collects and verifies soft assertions during test execution.
120    *
121    * @return the {@link CustomSoftAssertion} instance for the underlying quest.
122    */
123   @Override
124   public CustomSoftAssertion getSoftAssertions() {
125      return original.getSoftAssertions();
126   }
127
128
129   public Quest getOriginal() {
130      return original;
131   }
132
133}
